message:
Hi Stephen!
Thanks for the great article!

But I still have one question related to fixed UI example above. 
When we're adding `.ConfigureAwait(false)` to `GetJsonAsync(Uri uri)` - why we'll still able to change text in `textBox1.Text = json`? 
As far as I understand we will go without any context (and not even in UI thread) after `.ConfigureAwait(false)` in library method. 
Or `.ConfigureAwait(false)` will affect only continuation part of the method after `await`?
